column4: I have a small newbie question, but my friend told me you could be a server with linux, how do I go about doing this? And since I am worried about certain foreseeable problems, does linux alreay have a firewall?
I wanted to have downloadable files on my site
the easiest way to set up ubuntu as a server is to choose the 'server' install on the install disk
you would only have a command line interface though
